CustomField.description: In the 16-Digit membership ID, ISO is the first 3, Club Code is the next 3 digits, Member ID (Household Membership ID) is the next 7 digits, Assoc Member Id is the next 2 digits and Check Digit is the last digit Example: If the 16-Digit membership ID= 4382121353733023, then Associate ID will be 02. An associate ID with a value of 00 represents Membership Type as 'Primary' while other values represent the Membership Type as an 'Associate' Membership
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the 16-Digit membership ID, ISO is the first 3, Club Code is the next 3 digits, Member ID (Household Membership ID) is the next 7 digits, Assoc Member Id is the next 2 digits and Check Digit is the last digit Example: If the 16-Digit membership ID= 4382121353733023, then Associate ID will be 02. An associate ID with a value of 00 represents Membership Type as 'Primary' while other values represent the Membership Type as an 'Associate' Membership
CustomField.label: Associate ID
